ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So now taste My punishment and My commination!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So have a taste of My chastisement and My warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: One early morning Our torment brought upon them utter destruction. We said, "Suffer Our torment of which you were warned".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So taste My punishment, and My warnings!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then taste you My torment and My warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So taste My chastisement and My warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Taste now My chastisement and My warnings!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Now taste My punishment after My warnings!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Taste My punishment now that you have scorned My warnings!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Taste then My torment and My warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So taste ye My Wrath and My Warning."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then taste you My Torment and My Warnings."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Now, taste My punishment and My warnings'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So taste My punishment and My warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So taste My punishment and warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:39]   ‘So taste [now] My chastisement and My warnings!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Now taste My punishment after My warnings!) And I said to them: taste My punishment and the warning of My warners; those whom Lot warned but did not believe him. 630
